text:
hi am facing following error while deploying java chaincode on fabric:-

vp0_1  | 05:58:45.619 [dockercontroller] deployImage -> ERRO 018 Error building images: dial unix /var/run/docker.sock: connect: no such file or directory
vp0_1  | 05:58:45.619 [dockercontroller] deployImage -> ERRO 019 Image Output:
vp0_1  | ********************
vp0_1  |
vp0_1  | ********************
vp0_1  | 05:58:45.623 [dockercontroller] Start -> ERRO 01a start-could not recreate container Post <http://unix.sock/containers/create?name=dev-vp0-36a782cf3de8957b68078e18da0ff72d13d20d3b4ec82752c2695fa86b406cd5>: dial unix /var/run/docker.sock: connect: no such file or directory
vp0_1  | 05:58:45.623 [chaincode] Launch -> ERRO 01b launchAndWaitForRegister failed Error starting container: Post <http://unix.sock/containers/create?name=dev-vp0-36a782cf3de8957b68078e18da0ff72d13d20d3b4ec82752c2695fa86b406cd5>: dial unix /var/run/docker.sock: connect: no such file or directory
vp0_1  | 05:58:45.623 [dockercontroller] deployImage -> ERRO 01c Error building images: dial unix /var/run/docker.sock: connect: no such file or directory
vp0_1  | 05:58:45.623 [dockercontroller] deployImage -> ERRO 01d Image Output:
vp0_1  | ********************
vp0_1  |
vp0_1  | ********************
vp0_1  | 05:58:45.624 [dockercontroller] Start -> ERRO 01e start-could not recreate container Post <http://unix.sock/containers/create?name=dev-vp0-52fcae8cab392121bd5598e4caa320382813063f15d3fcf26edb4e3bed27ab65>: dial unix /var/run/docker.sock: connect: no such file or directory
vp0_1  | 05:58:45.624 [chaincode] Launch -> ERRO 01f launchAndWaitForRegister failed Error starting container: Post <http://unix.sock/containers/create?name=dev-vp0-52fcae8cab392121bd5598e4caa320382813063f15d3fcf26edb4e3bed27ab65>: dial unix /var/run/docker.sock: connect: no such file or directory
<@U0N4P17ND>  or <@U2R8AR09E> any idea for this issue ??
